p:
The effect of compounds 18 b, 19a, and 20a, on cell-cycle perturbation in MCF-7 cells was investigated based on previous report
44 . The MCF-7 cells were treated with each of the three compounds at 0, 1, 5, and 10 µM for 24 h. Following this treatment, the propidium iodide (PI)-stained cells were analysed. The results are outlined in Figure 8.
